title: san serif pseudo-kid print font id
content:
Thought I remembered this font, but can't! \*\*Sigh\*\* Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type sample print.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224091509/http:/typophile.com/files/type%20sample%20print_0.jpg) | 313.83 KB |
author: lellis

comments.content: An attachment or link will be useful. ; )
Weird. I guess it dropped. Thanks for the heads-up. Here 'tis! Libby

I'm having a hard time finding a category with anything like this style. I have checked MyFonts, Identifont, and Dafont, looking for any close styles. There have not been many, which surprised me. One font called [Imperfect](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224091509/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/imperfect/) from T-26 was promising as a potential source of key words or similar fonts, but the results were not close. I also checked the Distressed/Strange Script fonts in my Guide, but not much was similar besides [Farmhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224091509/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-farmhaus/).

If I were trying to describe it I would say "irregular sans", but searches along these lines were not helpful.

It seems likely to be a freebie, but I don't know where to look.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks, Mike. I appreciate your efforts a lot! Onward, I shall search. Libby
Maybe something from a scrapbooking site?
